Question: This person himself received psychiatric treatment from the analyst Erik Erikson, who was on staff at Riggs.
Hints: He had one brother, Jarvis Waring ****, Jr., older by a year and a half.
In 1949, this person donated an original Post cover, "April Fool", to be raffled off in a library fund raiser.
